00008 SocketTextHandler::SocketTextHandler() {
00009   m_Channels.insert(VERBOSE);
00010   m_Channels.insert(PROGRESS);
00011   m_Channels.insert(KILLMSG);
00012   m_Types.insert(TEXT);
00013   m_Finished = false;
00014   m_SuccessfulRun = true;
00015 
00016 }

00018 bool SocketTextHandler::hasFinished() {
00019   return m_Finished;
00020 }

00022 bool SocketTextHandler::successfulRun() {
00023   return m_SuccessfulRun;

00025 
00026 void SocketTextHandler::handleMessage(int type, int channel, const std::string &msg) {
00027   APT_ERR_ASSERT(m_Types.find(type) != m_Types.end(), "Don't support type: " + ToStr(type));
00028   APT_ERR_ASSERT(m_Channels.find(channel) != m_Channels.end(), "Don't support channel: " + ToStr(channel));
00029   std::map<std::string,std::string> param = SocketHandler::deserializeMap(msg);
00030   int verbosity = Convert::toInt(param["VERBOSITY"]);
00031   if (channel == VERBOSE) {
00032     Verbose::out(verbosity, param["MSG"], false);
00033   }
00034   else if (channel == COMPLETION) {
00035     Verbose::out(verbosity, "Sucessful Completion", true);
00036     m_Finished = true;
00037   }
00038   else if (channel == PROGRESS) {
00039     std::string value = param["VALUE"];
00040     if (value == "BEGIN") {
00041       int total = Convert::toInt(param["TOTAL"]);
00042       Verbose::progressBegin(verbosity, param["MSG"], total, 1, total);
00043     }
00044     else if(value == "STEP") {
00045       Verbose::progressStep(verbosity);
00046     }
00047     else if(value == "END") {
00048       Verbose::progressEnd(verbosity, param["MSG"]);
00049     }
00050   }
00051   else if (channel == KILLMSG){
00052         Verbose::out(verbosity, "Unsuccessful Completion", true);
00053     m_Finished = true;
00054         m_SuccessfulRun = false;
00055   }
00056 
00057 
00058   else {
00059     APT_ERR_ABORT("Don't recognize channel: " + ToStr(channel));
00060   }
00061     
00062 }
